title: Design for Textile-Small Triangles, Series #725
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
description: Two blueprints are stabled together. The larger of the two consistes of a linear pattern of intersecting triangles and the second, smaller sheet the intersecting triangles are solidly imprinted.
name: Diazo print
